body_html:
This is not super surprising -- I think the bidirectional rnn code that was used to write this checkpoint was in contrib at 1.0, and the internal structure of that code has changed since, changing some variable names, and thus making the checkpoint unreadable.

@ebrevdo can you confirm or refute this? The only thing that makes me wonder about the errors is that it's complaining about Adam state, but I still blame a scope name change for now.

body:
This is not super surprising -- I think the bidirectional rnn code that was used to write this checkpoint was in contrib at 1.0, and the internal structure of that code has changed since, changing some variable names, and thus making the checkpoint unreadable.

@ebrevdo can you confirm or refute this? The only thing that makes me wonder about the errors is that it's complaining about Adam state, but I still blame a scope name change for now.
